name: Community Environment Day at Ted Reeve Arena
description:
Join Councillor Bradford (Ward 19) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: Wokstars of Comedy - A Stand-Up Comedy Show
description:
Toronto's funniest Asian stand-up show! 

Featuring a lineup of elite Asian comedians including Canada's Got Talent Golden Buzzer winners and finalists, and a Kill Tony Golden Ticket winner. These are comics who've performed on the biggest stages, and they're bringing their absolute best to The Real Jerk – Legacy for one night only. Expect sharp material, big laughs, and a crowd that's ready for it.
